verses.verse: So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out with <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of his father <S%H1>Isaac.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4759>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> I am."

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your father; do not be <S%H1>afraid<s%> to <S%H3372>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3381>Egypt,<s%> for I will <S%H4714>make<s%> you a <S%H7760>great<s%> <S%H1419>nation<s%> <S%H1471>there.<s%>

"I will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with you to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5927>surely<s%> <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up <S%H3254>again;<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> will <S%H7896>close<s%> <S%H3027><s%> your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>"

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> their father <S%H1>Jacob<s%> and their <S%H3290>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and their <S%H2945>wives,<s%> in the <S%H802>wagons<s%> <S%H5699>which<s%> <S%H834>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H6547>sent<s%> to <S%H7971>carry<s%> him.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and their <S%H7399>property,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H7408>acquired<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> with him:

his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1121>grandsons<s%> with him, his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and his <S%H1323>granddaughters,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> with him to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> who <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Jacob's first-born.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu<s%> and <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H3223>Jemuel<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin<s%> and <S%H161>Ohad<s%> and <S%H3199>Jachin<s%> and <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> woman.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> and <S%H7956>Shelah<s%> and <S%H6557>Perez<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> (but <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>). And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> were <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H2538>Hamul.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%> <S%H8439>Tola<s%> and <S%H6312>Puvvah<s%> and <S%H3102>Iob<s%> and <S%H9616>Shimron.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%> <S%H5624>Sered<s%> and <S%H356>Elon<s%> and <S%H3177>Jahleel.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> in Paddan-aram, with his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> [numbered] thirty-three.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> <S%H6837>Ziphion<s%> and <S%H2291>Haggi,<s%> <S%H7764>Shuni<s%> and <S%H675>Ezbon,<s%> <S%H6179>Eri<s%> and <S%H722>Arodi<s%> and <S%H692>Areli.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher:<s%> <S%H3232>Imnah<s%> and <S%H3438>Ishvah<s%> and <S%H3440>Ishvi<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%> and their <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H8294>Serah.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah:<s%> <S%H2268>Heber<s%> and <S%H4439>Malchiel.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3812>Leah;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5315>persons.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Jacob's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel:<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

Now to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H621>Asenath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potiphera,<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H1106>Bela<s%> and <S%H1071>Becher<s%> and <S%H788>Ashbel,<s%> <S%H1617>Gera<s%> and <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> <S%H278>Ehi<s%> and <S%H9537>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4649>Muppim<s%> and <S%H2650>Huppim<s%> and <S%H714>Ard.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> [there were] <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%> in <S%H3605>all.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan:<s%> <S%H9127>Hushim.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%> <S%H3183>Jahzeel<s%> and <S%H1476>Guni<s%> and <S%H3337>Jezer<s%> and <S%H8006>Shillem.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> [there were] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%> in <S%H3605>all.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> belonging to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> his <S%H3409>direct<s%> <S%H3318>descendants,<s%> not <S%H905>including<s%> the <S%H802>wives<s%> of Jacob's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> [were] sixty-six <S%H5315>persons<s%> in <S%H3605>all,<s%>

and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were <S%H8147>two;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> [were] <S%H7657>seventy.<s%>

Now he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> to <S%H3384>point<s%> out [the way] <S%H6440>before<s%> him to <S%H1657>Goshen;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H631>prepared<s%> his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H1657>Goshen<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> his father <S%H1>Israel;<s%> as soon as he <S%H3478>appeared<s%> <S%H7200>before<s%> him, he <S%H413>fell<s%> on his <S%H5307>neck<s%> and <S%H6677>wept<s%> on his <S%H1058>neck<s%> a <S%H6677>long<s%> <S%H5750>time.<s%>

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H6471>"Now<s%> let me <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H310>since<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> that you are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>"

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and to his father's <S%H1004>household,<s%> "I will <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and will <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'My <S%H251>brothers<s%> and my father's <S%H1004>household,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to me;

and the <S%H376>men<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> for they have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H376>keepers<s%> of <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that they have.'
"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> you and <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> is your <S%H4639>occupation<s%>?'

that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H376>keepers<s%> of <S%H4735>livestock<s%> from our <S%H5271>youth<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we and our fathers,' that you may <S%H1>live<s%> in the <S%H3427>land<s%> of <S%H776>Goshen;<s%> for <S%H1657>every<s%> <S%H3605>shepherd<s%> is <S%H7462>loathsome<s%> to the <S%H8441>Egyptians.<s%> "
